verbs.description: [ARG0: Former Vice President Biden] [ARGM-ADV: just] [V: issued] [ARG1: a scorching rebuke of the Trump administration staffer who mocked Sen. John McCain ( R - Ariz . ) at White House meeting] .
Former Vice President Biden just issued a [V: scorching] [ARG0: rebuke] of the Trump administration staffer who mocked Sen. John McCain ( R - Ariz . ) at White House meeting .

Former Vice President Biden just issued a scorching rebuke of [ARG0: the Trump administration staffer] [R-ARG0: who] [V: mocked] [ARG1: Sen. John McCain ( R - Ariz . )] [ARGM-LOC: at White House meeting] .
